com.github.robtimus.io.stream

Class HexOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • com.github.robtimus.io.stream.HexOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public final class HexOutputStream
extends OutputStream
    An output stream that converts bytes into hex.

    When a hex output stream is closed, its wrapped Appendable will be closed as well if it implements Closeable or AutoCloseable.

    Author:
    Rob Spoor

    • Constructor Detail

      • HexOutputStream

        public HexOutputStream(Appendable destination)
        Creates a new hex output stream. It will write hex in lower case.
        Parameters:
        destination - The appendable to write to.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given appendable is null.

      • HexOutputStream

        public HexOutputStream(Appendable destination,
                       boolean upperCase)
        Creates a new hex output stream.
        Parameters:
        destination - The appendable to write to.
        upperCase - true to write hex in upper case, or false to write hex in lower case.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given appendable is null.

      • encode

        public static String encode(byte[] b)
        Converts a byte array to its lower case hex representation.
        Parameters:
        b - The byte array to convert.
        Returns:
        The hex representation of the given byte array.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given byte array is null.

      • encode

        public static String encode(byte[] b,
                            int start,
                            int end)
        Converts a portion of byte array to its lower case hex representation.
        Parameters:
        b - The byte array to convert a portion of.
        start - The start index of the portion to convert, inclusive.
        end - The end index of the portion to convert, exclusive.
        Returns:
        The hex representation of the given portion of the given byte array.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given byte array is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the given start index is negative, the given end index is larger than the given array's length, or the given start index is larger than the given end index.

      • encode

        public static String encode(byte[] b,
                            boolean upperCase)
        Converts a byte array to its hex representation.
        Parameters:
        b - The byte array to convert.
        upperCase - true to return hex in upper case, or false to return hex in lower case.
        Returns:
        The hex representation of the given byte array.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given byte array is null.

      • encode

        public static String encode(byte[] b,
                            int start,
                            int end,
                            boolean upperCase)
        Converts a portion of a byte array to its hex representation.
        Parameters:
        b - The byte array to convert a portion of.
        start - The start index of the portion to convert, inclusive.
        end - The end index of the portion to convert, exclusive.
        upperCase - true to return hex in upper case, or false to return hex in lower case.
        Returns:
        The hex representation of the given portion of the given byte array.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given byte array is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the given start index is negative, the given end index is larger than the given array's length, or the given start index is larger than the given end index.
